frontmatter.title: Multi-Factor Authentication on Firewalls
frontmatter.description: Just like using MFA on any staff used applications, you must consider using MFA on your firewalls. These are the first line of defence against unwanted traffic - stop it before it becomes an issue.

frontmatter.title: Disable remote administrative access to firewalls entirely
Use IP Allowlists (Whitelists) on Firewalls and block all other connections by default.
